Post-Match Reflections: Joe Gauci in action at Adelaide Oval. It does feel like a new beginning. This is a positive step in the right direction. It wasn’t perfect by any means. We have a lot to work on and we go away to Japan for a tough game, but we are looking forward to the challenge and ultimately if we want to be in world football, we have to be coming up against the best teams and facing them head-on and ready to compete.
Goodwin is player of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Socceroos have jumped up to third spot in Group C behind Japan and Saudi Arabia
Nishan Velupillay - the first Aussie of Sri Lankan descent to represent this team - bangs home the sealer in stoppage time
Tony Popovic’s selection of his former Melbourne Victory charge raised many an eyebrow across the game
